Description:
Rejoice, fans of PE2 - REC: V direct continuation PE2. The main heroine here is Claire Redfield. After the events in Raccoon City, Claire continues to search for her missing brother Chris. She goes to the branch Ã‚Â«UmbrellaÃ‚Â» in France and trying to get there, but unfortunately, the attempt failed - Claire is caught and sent to prison.

Over time, an unknown group attacked the island and destroy all military forces in this godforsaken piece land. With this attack, escapes to freedom by a new virus called the T-Veronica. Soldier who caught Claire lets her and says that she has no chance to leave the island (oh, naive).

Later Claire meets a guy named Steve Burnside. Newly couple united their forces and trying to leave the island. In their way stands a military base master Alfred Ashford. He blames Claire is what happened to his base and trying to eliminate her. About the story can be told for a long time, the benefit is it's extremely good.
